channel.title: Tanks for boys on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Tanks for boys on Game6r

item.title: Battle Tank
item.description: In this game for boys for 7 years old, you will have to go to a not too optimistic future where nightmarish zombies have taken over almost the entire planet. In order to get to one of the cities, in which there is still a military garrison of people, use a small tank. Try to drive it to the rescue checkpoint.
